Description: Fragment of disc foot of Attic pottery kylix; glazed save for outer edge; inscription cut on top of foot.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of the Dioskouroi (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Curator's comments: It would not have been easy to cut this text, at least the right way up, on the intact vase.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXV, no. 698)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 676, no. 351)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1602)
